extension.name: Universal Menu
extension.author: Alex Segal
extension.description:
Universal Menu Module v1.10.1

Helps to build Joomla!-based drop-down, accordion, mobile or responsive menu. Featured built-in VirtueMart support, RTL-ready CSS-styles, animation effects, rich backend configurations and more. Compatible with Joomla 1.6, 1.7, 2.5 and Joomla 3.x

field.name: menutype
field.label: Select Menu
field.description: Select a menu in the list.

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Level to start rendering the menu at. Setting the start and end levels to the same # and setting 'Show Sub-menu Items' to yes will only display that single level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: Level to stop rendering the menu at. If you choose 'All', all levels will be shown depending on 'Show Sub-menu Items' setting.

field.name: showAllChildren
field.label: Show Sub-menu Items
field.description: Expand the menu and make its sub-menu items always visible.

field.name: loadVMCategories
field.label: VirtueMart Subcategories
field.description: Load sub-categories below the categories of VirtueMart.

field.name: showParentCategory
field.label: Show Parent Category
field.description: Show parent category of VirtueMart or hide it. By default module gets settings from the Menu Item Settings > Page Layout.

field.name: cssTheme
field.label: CSS Theme
field.description: The theme used for skinning the menu.

field.name: imageTitlePosition
field.label: Image Title Position
field.description: Choose how to display image title, before or after the image.

field.name: arrowPosition
field.label: Arrow Position
field.description: Choose how to display subcategory arrow indicator, before or after item title.

field.name: mobileMenuIcon
field.label: Mobile Menu Icon
field.description: Enables menu icon â‰¡ (character 'identical to').

field.name: mobileMenuTitle
field.label: Mobile Menu Title
field.description: Enter mobile menu title (for example MENU).

field.name: javascriptMenu
field.label: JavaScript Menu
field.description: Enables javascript menu scripts.

field.name: animationEffect
field.label: Animation Effect
field.description: The animation effect used for adding animation to a menu.

field.name: animationDuration
field.label: Animation Duration (ms)
field.description: Defines how long the animation will run (optimal value for fade and slide effects is 250, for accordion - 500).

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: Whether to load the jQuery library (disable to prevent conflicts with other jQuery modules).

field.name: expandSubMenus
field.label: Initial State
field.description: Defines the initial state of the menu items: expand the menu or collapse it.

field.name: autoStretchMenu
field.label: Auto-Stretch Menu
field.description: Auto-stretch menu items evenly and fully across a menu's container.

field.name: toggleOnHover
field.label: Toggle Effect on Hover
field.description: Toggle just hovering the mouse pointer over a menu?

field.name: disableParentLink
field.label: Disable Parent Link
field.description: Clicking parent links only toggles them, doesn't navigate to page.

field.name: responsiveMenu
field.label: Responsive Menu
field.description: Whether to enable the responsive mobile menu.

field.name: mobileViewportSize
field.label: Mobile Screen Size (px)
field.description: Defines mobile viewport screen width.

field.name: tag_id
field.label: Menu Tag ID
field.description: An ID attribute to assign to the root UL tag of the menu (optional)

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the menu items

field.name: window_open
field.label: Target Position
field.description: JavaScript values to position a popup window, e.g. top=50,left=50,width=200,height=300
